overview: Nigel is a writer and his muse has left him. Even his gorgeous nymphomaniac wife can't get his mojo going. And then his young, naughty stepdaughter arrives. Boing! His mojo is up along with lots of other things! Starring luscious Carter Cruise as the stepdaughter, exotic Dana Vespoli as the wife, scintillating Scarlet Red as the stepdaughter's randy friend with Marcus London, Erik Everhard, Logan Pierce and Gavin Kane.
title: Forbidden Affairs 3: The Stepdaughter
